items.title: About
items.summary: I am part of The Game Assembly’s internship program. As per the agreement between the Game Industry and The Game…
items.content_html:
I am part of The Game Assembly’s internship program. As per the agreement between the Game Industry and The Game Assembly, neither student nor company may be in contact with one another regarding internships before April 23rd. 

Any internship offers can be made on May 6th, at the earliest.

Contact

items.title: UI Editor
items.summary: Motivation / Goal stuff about how its easier with an editor rather than edit ui with code stuff bout goal…
items.content_html:
Motivation / Goal

stuff about how its easier with an editor rather than edit ui with code

stuff bout goal how the editors purpose was to make the design of the layouts easier and faster

I created UI Editor, Component system

Features
 - Save/Load
 - Add/Remove component
 - Scale/Size/Rotation/Position
 - Render order
 - Drag and drop textures
 - Change pixel shader
 - Button functions

Components
- Sprite
- Button
- SpriteSheet
- SpriteMorph
- Text
- TextField

some stuff sorting, move to front / back, move forward / backwards

We used Direct3D 11 SpriteBatch, so to change pixel and vertexshader for specific sprites such as SpriteMorph

Sprite Sheet, change amount of colums/rows the texture has and total playtime

This is some stuff i made, vertex shader, uses speed and radius on each vertex

Improvements

 - Copy elements / components
 - Parent / Child hierarchy 
 - Add more components such as animation (size/rotation/position)
